oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tomb of Dominique You
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tomb of Dominique You in St. Louis Cemetery. Sepia photograph shows large burial vault engraved on front with a Freemason square and compass and an epitaph.
Pirate captain Dominique You (1775-1830) fought with Jean Lafitte. You commanded an artillery company at the Battle of New Orleans.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Laffite, Jean
Laffite, Jean;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Louisiana--History--War of 1812
Tombs & sepulchral monuments
